name: etki/allure-runner
description: Simple package providing API for allure-cli implementation

suggest.codeception/codeception: Rich testing framework Allure runner provides support for
suggest.sebastianbergmann/phpunit: Industry standard PHP testing framework Allure runner provides support for
suggest.allure-framework/allure-codeception: Allure Framework integration extension for Codeception
suggest.allure-framework/allure-phpunit: Allure Framework integration listener for PHPUnit
